listing_by_owner.map: function(doc) { if(doc.pvt_deleted || !doc.custom_channel_vars.owner_id || doc.pvt_type != 'cdr') return; emit([doc.custom_channel_vars.owner_id, doc.pvt_created], {'id':doc._id, 'caller_id_name': doc.caller_id_name, 'caller_id_number': doc.caller_id_number, 'callee_id_name': doc.callee_id_name, 'callee_id_number': doc.callee_id_number, 'duration_seconds': doc.duration_seconds, 'timestamp': doc.timestamp, 'hangup_cause':doc.hangup_cause, 'other_leg_call_id':doc.other_leg_call_id, 'call_direction':doc.call_direction, 'to': doc.to_uri, 'from': doc.from_uri, 'inception':doc.custom_channel_vars.inception})}
